title: Fresh Bakery and Cafe Taipei
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery
description: Vegan bakery and cafe with multicultural offerings with bread from Europe, South Africa, and Asia. Opened Jan 2013. Fruit bread, nut bread, savory bread, burgers, coffee, tea, juice, pizza. Desserts include chocolate mousse, cakes, cupcakes and cookies. Near Kunyang MRT station, one-minute walk from exit 4.
